com.doerit.doerdb.util

Class DatabaseConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.doerit.doerdb.util.DatabaseConverter

  • public class DatabaseConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    DatabaseConverter is used to convert the existing databases to DoerDBs.

      • convertToDoerDB

        public void convertToDoerDB(boolean localOnly)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException,
                            InvalidException
        Converts the given pair of local and remote databases into DoerDatabases. Creates a meta table in both databases. Generates triggers required for recording queries on meta tables.
        Parameters:
        localOnly - true if only the local Database is required to be transformed, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If any error occurs while querying the database.
        InvalidException - If meta table is currently found in any of the databases.

      • convertToDoerDB

        public void convertToDoerDB()
                     throws java.sql.SQLException,
                            InvalidException
        Converts the given pair of local and remote databases into DoerDatabases. Creates a meta table in both databases. Generates triggers required for recording queries on meta tables. Always converts both databases(local and remote) into DoerDatabases.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If any error occurs while querying the database.
        InvalidException - If meta table is currently found in any of the databases.

      • getDoerDB

        public DoerDB getDoerDB()
                 throws java.sql.SQLException,
                        InitializationFailureException,
                        NotFoundException
        Returns a DoerDB instance for the pair of databases provided initially.
        Returns:
        DoerDB identified by the pair of databases.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If any exception occurs while connecting to databases.
        InitializationFailureException - If database is invalid DoerDB.
        NotFoundException - If Meta Table / Sync Table / Any trigger(s) are not found in any of the given databases.
